/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings and skyscrapers, their glass and concrete facades reflecting the bright sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun casting a bright light that illuminates the scene. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Cars and buses can be seen in motion on the road, indicating the city's dynamic pace of life.
